confidence.description: Value between 0 and 1 on confidence of answer

nuance.description: Value between 0 and 1 on quality of analyzing mixed or varied emotions

explainability.description: Value between 0 and 1 on how well the explanation captures the original text

improvement.description: New dictionary based on replicating the schema of input dictionary. Your values may or may not be the same but they keys must be identical.
